title: Former Belgian Champion Ludo Dierckxsens Collapses, Dies During 1000km Charity Event
content:
The bulking Belgian ex-pro hit a career highlight when he won a stage in the 1999 Tour de France in the national champion's jersey. He died Thursday at 60.

Read the full article at Former Belgian Champion Ludo Dierckxsens Collapses, Dies During 1000km Charity Event on Velo.
author: ahood
